00023 void Motor::inc(int s){

00025   updateSpeed();

00062 void Motor::goTo(int target, int s){
00063   if (throttle > target) dec(s);
00064   else if (throttle < target) inc(s);
00065 }

00067 void Motor::goToIdle(int s){
